H0.text: What ancient monument and tourist attraction would you see at Carnac in northern France. Dolmen

H1.text: What ancient monument and tourist attraction would you see at Carnac in northern France. Cairn

H2.text: What ancient monument and tourist attraction would you see at Carnac in northern France. Broch

H3.text: What ancient monument and tourist attraction would you see at Carnac in northern France. Menhir

A4.text: Northwestern France has some 1,200 further examples of menhirs.

A5.text: Menhirs are found individually as monoliths, or as part of a group of similar stones.
